name: Spy Game (fzsav)
description:
You are a Cap. Sule. A secret operative on a mission to retrieve a secret document guarded by the best elite guards. Find the house of where the document is stored and escape the menacing spies hunting you down.

Controls:

  • WASD/Mouse - Movement
  • LMB - Fire Button
  • E - Interact Button
  • R - Restart Button

At first you begin with nothing, you need to find a way around all of these guards, if you get to close they will close in on you to investigate, as soon as they confirm your presence, then they will shoot you. Find a way into the house (Hint: go forward, then turn right, and then turn right again, keep going forward, and a house will appear)

There are two versions of the game: A HTML one where most of the assets are uploaded, but since the rendering is not set to linear some parts are left out, to see the full experience download the zipped version of the game and run the .exe file.

Credits (Assets that I did not create):

Voice Actors:

  • M: Lauren Scotti
  • Cap. Sule. : Nana Ampoma-Mensah

Sound Effects/Music:

  • Wind Ambience Noise:

  • James Bond Theme:
  • Alert! Sound:
  • Death Sound:

Good Luck Agent.
